version_description:
・The stability of online matches has been improved.
・Other issues fixed.

New Features
・You can switch between "Advanced" and "Classic" controls during a match.
・Player and manager data has been updated.
・Added the "Practice" menu.
・New variations of Energy Recovery items are available at the Shop.

Feature Changes
・The procedure for transferring your data was updated.
・The "CLUB HOUSE" RESUME has been completely removed and its menu structure updated.
・Navigating the "Squad Management" and some of its features have been improved.
・You can use multiple trainers at the same time in "Training".
・You can renew contracts after a match.
・The display standard for player stats "Weak Foot Usage", "Weak Foot Accuracy", "Form", and "Injury Resistance" has been changed.
・Other miscellaneous improvements have been made.

Others
・A number of issues were fixed.
A number of issues were fixed.
A number of issues were fixed.

New Features
・"Local League" features implemented in-game
・The new "ONLINE MATCH CHALLENGES" event is now available
・New items added

Others
・Previously reported issues fixed
・Other issues fixed

The previously reported issues below have been fixed.
・Users suddenly become unable to press opposing players during games.
A number of issues were fixed.

Renewed licenses
- Team, player and manager data will be updated to match the start of the 2017-18 season.
- Some players portraits will change to photographs.

New features added
- Register friends and play online matches against them.

Easier than ever to play
- Contract Renewals for players will cost half as much GP or myClub Coins than before.

Big improvements to matches
- Play the tutorials using the Classic controls.
- Switch the manager's Tactics between offensive and defensive during matches.
- Adjustments to match balance.
- Updates to the in-match display (HUD).

Other changes
- Updates to various visual aspects of the game.
- Changes to the soundtrack.

・A "Concede Match" option has been added to Online Matches.
・The display has been improved and controls made more user-friendly across the game.
・The BGM (music) Volume Level has been adjusted.
・The iPhone X's display has been optimized.
・A number of issues were fixed.
A number of issues were fixed.

・ Changed the name of Colombia's league, as well as the name of clubs belonging to the league
・ Improved game stability, thereby reducing the occurrence of crashes
・ Fixed several issues
*See the in-game news for more information.

A number of issues were fixed.
* Check out the News section in-game for more information.

The face data for a number of players has been updated.
A number of issues were fixed.
* Check out the News section in-game for more information.

A number of issues were fixed.
* Check out the News section in-game for more information.

-Data for some teams, players, and managers has been updated.
-CFA Super League promotions and relegations have been updated.
-J. LEAGUE uniforms have been updated to the 2019 season.
*Uniforms for Japanese clubs in the ACL will not be updated.
-A number of issues were fixed.
*Check out the News section in-game for more information.

A number of issues were fixed.
* Check out the News section in-game for more information.

A number of issues were fixed.
* Check out the News section in-game for more information.

-Data for some teams, players, and managers will be updated.
-Stadium names will now be displayed during matches.
-The layout of Online Match Records will be reorganized.
-Manager's offensive and defensive tactics will now have an impact on each player's familiarity.
-Updates to various visual aspects of the game.
-A number of issues were fixed.

*Philippe Coutinho, currently depicted on the app icon, is still recorded in the game as belonging to Liverpool FC. This data will be revised in the near future with an update that will reflect his current club membership.

-Season 18C players now available.
-New scouts available.
-List of players obtainable from Standard Agents and Scouts updated.
-Manager data updated.
-Improved the layout of the [Contract] screen.
-mproved the layout of the [Extras] screen.
-A number of issues were fixed.
*Check out the News section in-game for more information.

-A number of issues were fixed.
* Check out the News section in-game for further details.

-A number of issues were fixed.
* Check out the News section in-game for more information.

-Both the app icon and the title screen have been updated.
-A number of issues were fixed.
* Check out the News section in-game for more information.
The issue that prevented the game from booting on iPhone XS and XS Max has been fixed.

License Updates
・Team, player, and manager data from the start of the 2018-2019 season implemented in-game
・Licenses of {12} new leagues added
・New legend players added

New Features
・Player signings via trades
・Various new items
・Live Updates
・Featured Players

More Engaging Matches
・Latest match engine from {PES 2019} console implemented
・Momentous graphical improvements thanks to UNREAL ENGINE 4 
・In-Match HUD revamped

Improved Accessibility
・"Energy" mechanic removed
・Agent cost lowered
・More frequent manager list updates
・Added support for several new languages
・Max slot capacity increased

Presentation Improvements
・Enhanced visuals
・New music

Other Changes
・Changes to player level caps
・Expiration dates added to agents earned as rewards

-A number of issues were fixed.
* Check out the News section in-game for more information.

Data for some teams, players, and managers has been updated.

New Legend player data has been added. It will appear in upcoming campaigns.

The J.LEAGUE promotions and relegations have been updated.
(The promoted clubs have been added, and the names, kits, and emblems for the relegated teams have been replaced with generic data)

TOYOTA Thai League promotions and relegations have been updated.
(The promoted clubs have been added)

Several songs from the game's soundtrack have been removed.

The Privacy Notice has been updated.
*The changes are only visible in some regions.

A number of issues were fixed.

- Updated team, player, and manager data from September 2019
- New PES Partner Clubs from the top level of European soccer
- Major gameplay improvements
- New screenshot feature added to the Squad Management screen
- Improved matchmaking functionality
- Enhanced visuals
- New music
*Check out the News section in-game for more information.

A number of issues were fixed.
* Check out the News section in-game for more information.

・ Changed the name of Colombia's league, as well as the name of clubs belonging to the league
・ Improved game stability, thereby reducing the occurrence of crashes
・ Fixed several issues
*See the in-game news for more information.

-New mode "Matchday" added.
-"Dynamic Wide", "Stadium", and "Live Broadcast" camera types added.
-Data for some teams, players, and managers has been updated.
-A number of issues were fixed.
*Check out the News section in-game for more information.
A number of issues were fixed.

・The following squads are now can now be purchased from the SHOP: MANCHESTER UNITED, ARSENAL, INTER, JUVENTUS, MILAN, FC BARCELONA, FC BAYERN MÜNCHEN.
・"100 myClub Coins + RONALDINHO" item that includes a special 2019 version of Ronaldinho added to the SHOP.
・Changes made to make uniform selection easier and more intuitive.
・Added new limited-time login bonuses that will be available during campaigns and other events.
・Updated data for several teams, players, and managers.
・Added new Legend players who will be available in campaigns and other upcoming events.
・Changed the default Condition Rating for Legend players to "B".
・Relegations and promotions from Campeonato Brasileiro implemented in-game.
・Relegations and promotions from the TOYOTA Thai League implemented in-game. As a result, PTT Rayong's in-game club name, uniforms, and emblem have been replaced with generic assets.
・Relegations and promotions from J.League's J1 and J2 Leagues implemented in-game. As a result, clubs relegated to the J3 League have had their in-game club names, uniforms, and emblems replaced with generic assets.
・Linking data now allows you to check your KONAMI ID account details in-game.
・A number of issues were fixed.
* Check out the News section in-game for more information.

・Added the new "Iconic Moment Series" of players to the game.
・Added new Legends.
(To be released in campaigns and other upcoming events.)

・A number of issues were fixed.
* Check out the News section in-game for more information.
